Welcome to Skeleventy!

A skeleton boilerplate built with Eleventy and Tailwind CSS.

Features

  • Tailwind CSS for beautiful and fast UI styling
  • Gulp to watch and compile your Tailwind, SCSS & JS files
  • Purgecss to remove any unused CSS
  • HTML minifier
  • A simple blog, with categories and featured images
